name: AssociateTestMethodsWithTestCases
description: Azure DevOps task for managing the associations between Test Methods and Test Cases.
author: ilionx

inputs.name: CollectionUri
inputs.label: Collection Uri
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure DevOps collection Uri used for accessing the project work items.

inputs.name: ProjectName
inputs.label: Project Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project name containing the test plan.

inputs.name: SourceFolder
inputs.label: Source Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source folder used to execute the tool on.

inputs.name: MinimatchPatterns
inputs.label: Minimatch Patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown: Minimatch patterns to search for within the source folder, separated by a semicolon. [Learn more about minimatch patterns](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/tasks/file-matching-patterns?view=azure-devops)

inputs.name: PersonalAccesstoken
inputs.label: Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The personal access token used for accessing the Azure DevOps project.
It can accept variable defined in build or release pipelines as `$(passwordVariable)`.
You may mark a variable as 'secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: TestPlanId
inputs.label: Test Plan
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a test plan containing the test suites with test cases.

inputs.name: TestSuiteId
inputs.label: Test Suite
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a test suite containing the test cases.

inputs.name: TestType
inputs.label: Test Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The automation test type. For custom test types, just write the type within the input field.

inputs.name: ValidateOnly
inputs.label: Validate Only
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicate if you only want to validate the changes without saving the work item.

inputs.name: VerboseLogging
inputs.label: Verbose Logging
inputs.helpMarkDown: When turned on it also outputs the successful matchings and the fixes next to the warnings/errors.

inputs.name: DebugMode
inputs.label: Debug Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: When debug mode is turned on any exception thrown by the tool will be printed to the console. Use this only in case of unsolvable issues.
